name: Crazy tiles
description:
This is my first unity game, basically you being on an island where different natural disasters and some other special event happen. The game is compatible on windows and android, also if you are on android and decide to connect a keyboard it should work too.

Known bugs: The sea shader is not applied correctly on some devices, if this happens to you please send a report in the game's reporting system, try to send as much information as you can.
